title: IIPS Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for 02 Project Officer Posts
description: The International Institute for Population Sciences (IIPS) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 02 Project Officer Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech, MCA, and M.Sc can grab this chance and apply for the IIPS Recruitment 2025 . Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested candidates can attend the walk-in at the address giv...
